script: Ever wish your AI could remember things before answering? That’s Retrieval-Augmented Generation, or RAG! It’s like a librarian first checking the shelves before helping you—retrieving facts, then crafting a perfect reply. Why does it matter? RAG makes AI smarter, pulling from real, up-to-date info instead of guessing. No more outdated or made-up answers—just accurate, helpful responses. It’s the future of reliable AI!
